getOriginalAuthentication

public static org.acegisecurity.Authentication getOriginalAuthentication()
Returns the original unfabricated Authentication created by Acegi. NOTE: Hopefully, this solution -- we need to keep two different Authentication objects and swap them out when need be -- is temporary, and later we will figure out a more elegant way. But for now it is what it is.

Returns:

isSiteScoped

public static boolean isSiteScoped(java.lang.String roleName)
Will return true, if the roles is ONLY site scoped. Note : By default all study scoped roles are site scoped.

Parameters:
roleName -
Returns:

splitProtectionGroup

public static java.lang.String[] splitProtectionGroup(java.lang.String pgName)
Will split the protection group into 2 parts. Eg: Study.NCCTG N06C6.1 will result in {Study, NCCTG N06C6.1}

Parameters:
pgName -
Returns:
